title: 'Sell America' has sparked a FOMO-fueled rush to gold and silver among everyday investors
full_text: 'Sell America' has sparked a FOMO-fueled rush to gold and silver among everyday investors. Precious metals markets saw record inflows in 2025, with investors reacting to US economic volatility, tariffs, and "Sell America" sentiment.. Jeremy Cerza, a 45-year-old retail investor, admits he isn't that experienced in markets, but even he knows metals stole the show in 2025. Gold and silver were among the best-performing investments … [+6141 chars]
